channel.title: Inventory space
channel.description:
Hey guy,
I'm using a Devolution 7.0 server source and when i thieve from my stall when i have a full inventory it just says "No inventory space" but still gives xp.
All help is appreciated
Thanx

item.title: Inventory space
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Oh ok, i found an example of it, but how would i put that into mine?

The example is:

if ((actionTimer == 0) && (IsMining == true)) { if ((IsItemInBag(1706) == true) || (IsItemInBag(1708) == true) || (IsItemInBag(1710) == true) || (IsItemInBag(1712) == true)) { RndGems /= 2; } addSkillXP(((int) (2 * mining[2] * mining[3] * 3.14)), playerMining); addItem(mining[4], 1); sendMessage("You get some ores."); if (mining[1] == 85) { server.lastRunite = System.currentTimeMillis(); } resetAnimation(); resetMI(); } } else { sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); resetMI(); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Inventory space
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

And how would i do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Inventory space
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Never used Devolution. Find the code that gives you the experience and the item, and make it so it doesn’t give experience if the item wasn’t added.

Read full topic
